entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 07:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
